title: The Adventures of Heidi Martinez: The Consulting Hero
summary: Heidi Martinez discovers her ability to change realities by giving consultations, using it to solve crimes and personal crises over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Heidi Martinez entdeckt ihre Fähigkeit, durch Beratungen Realitäten zu verändern, und nutzt sie, um innerhalb einer Woche Verbrechen und persönliche Krisen zu lösen.
summaryDutch: Heidi Martinez ontdekt haar vermogen om realiteiten te veranderen door consultaties te geven, en gebruikt dit om binnen een week misdaden en persoonlijke crises op te lossen.
summaryFrench: Heidi Martinez découvre sa capacité à changer les réalités en donnant des consultations, l'utilisant pour résoudre des crimes et des crises personnelles au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Heidi Martinez starts her week as usual at her consulting firm, unaware that today she will discover her unique abilities. After giving advice to a distressed client, she notices the client's mood immediately lightens—an effect far stronger than her normal consulting influence.

Today, Heidi decides to test her newfound powers by advising a local store owner on how to boost sales. Miraculously, by evening, the store sees a record number of customers. Heidi feels exhilarated by her success.
Heidi is approached by the police to help resolve a tense hostage situation. Using her advice, the police safely resolve the issue without harm. Heidi realizes the potential of her powers to do good.

Feeling the weight of her abilities, Heidi is momentarily overwhelmed and unsure if she should intervene in people's lives so directly. After a long walk and reflection, she feels peaceful, understanding her role better.

Heidi uses her consulting to help a failing local school. By the end of the day, she secures new funding and innovative teachers ready to turn the school around. The community's gratitude makes her immensely happy.

Using her consulting superhero identity, Heidi speaks at a conference, influencing other consultants to use their skills for social good. Her words inspire many, filling her with a sense of energy and purpose.
Reflecting on her week, Heidi feels a deep sense of fulfillment. She decides to write a book about her experiences, hoping to guide others with her knowledge and experience.

moral: With great power comes great responsibility.
